posts.title: JointJs
posts.text: 官网JointJs教程，推荐入门模板JointJs流程图 JointJs StartChange style12345678910111213141516171819202122//坐标position: { x: x, y: y}, //大小size: { width: 140, height: 100}, //添加链接markup: '<a><rect/><text/></a>',attrs: { a: { xlinkHref: linkview, xlinkShow: 'new', cursor: 'pointer' }, text: { text: text }} More info: SVG Close drag1234567891011var ElementView = joint.dia.ElementView.extend({ pointerdown: function() { return false; }, pointermove: function(evt, x, y) { return false; }, pointerup: function(evt, x, y) { return false; }}); Close all events1paper.$el.css('pointer-events', 'none') Zoom1paper.scale(1);
